title: 1. Bad Philosophy | Andrew Loke
description:
Hi everyone! A few months ago, Andrew Loke and Eli Haitov published an article in Analytic Philosophy called "A New Hilbert's Hotel Argument Against Past-Eternalism", which can be found here: https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/phib.12371. Recently, I recorded a critique of that article with Alex Malpass and Dan Linford, which can be found here: https://youtu.be/vNHCQslpXdo. In reply, Loke wrote a document listing out 30 "errors" he thinks we made.

In today's video, I'm going to respond.
